tool_description: Organizes and manages collections of research sources with tagging, categorization, and hierarchical grouping capabilities.

source_titles.description: List of source titles to include

priority_levels.description: Priority level for each source (high, medium, low)

error_messages: Missing collection name: Provide a non-empty collection_name.
Empty source list: At least one source must be provided in source_titles.
Mismatched arrays: source_titles and source_authors must have the same length.
Invalid priority level: Use high, medium, or low for priority_levels.
Collection size exceeded: Maximum 500 sources per collection.
Duplicate sources: Remove duplicate titles from the source list.
usage: Provide collection_name, source_titles array, and source_authors array. Optionally add tags, research_themes, priority_levels, and collection_description for better organization.

collection_id.description: Unique identifier for the created collection

total_sources.description: Total number of sources in collection

organization_summary.description: Summary of how sources are organized

priority_breakdown.description: Breakdown of sources by priority level
